item.title: A Beast of an Engine!
item.description: What makes an engine a "beast"? This video breaks down the raw power, torque, and engineering of this incredible machine, showing why it’s a favorite among enthusiasts.

media:content.media:title: A Beast of an Engine!
media:content.media:description: What makes an engine a "beast"? This video breaks down the raw power, torque, and engineering of this incredible machine, showing why it’s a favorite among enthusiasts.

item.title: Dealer Quoted $20K to Fix This Jag! Can I Do It for Half?
item.description: A dealer quoted $20,000 to fix this Jaguar. I’m taking on the challenge to see if I can do the complex repair for half the price and save a massive amount of money.

item.title: How Do You Know Where the Draw is?
item.description: How does a mechanic track down a battery-draining electrical draw? This video explains the step-by-step diagnostic process used to locate the exact source of a hidden electrical leak.

item.title: 1992 SAAB & 2011 Chevy Cruze Abandoned
item.description: Go inside the world of forgotten automobiles. We'll show you the unusual state of an abandoned Saab and a Chevy Cruze, detailing their damage and their final resting spot.

item.title: My TOP pick: The BEST small truck on the road today!
item.description: Go inside the highest-rated small truck on the market. We'll show you why this model is one of the most popular and dependable trucks, covering its design, engine, and innovative features.

item.title: A Good Standard Old School 350!
item.description: What made the Chevy 350 an old-school legend? This video is a deep dive into the classic engine, breaking down its design, power, and long-term reliability.

item.title: Is it going to the junk yard?
item.description: We break down the damage and the cost to find out if it's worth fixing or if the junk yard is its only option.

item.title: These Cars Were Abandoned by their Owners!
item.description: What happens to cars when their owners walk away? This video documents the unbelievable finds in junkyards and fields, revealing the surprising stories behind these abandoned vehicles.

item.title: This is How We Install Them!
item.description: We'll show you the professional workflow for tackling this installation.

item.title: A Small Coolant Leak Turned Drastic!
item.description: A Small Coolant Leak Turned Drastic! #reel #coolant #cars #carwizard #fblifestyle

item.title: Six Used Cars To Never Ever Buy!
item.description: What are the least reliable used cars on the market? This video answers that question, revealing 6 models with serious long-term issues that every consumer should know about.

item.title: Small Plastic Part has Ruined the Car!
item.description: The secret to a car breakdown? Sometimes it’s just one small part. We’ll show you the full extent of the unexpected damage and the challenging repair that brought this car back to life.

item.title: So Much Smoke Coming Under the Hood!
item.description: What happens when smoke pours out from under the hood? This video documents the complex diagnostic process to find the source of a dangerous engine problem and how we managed to get it fixed safely.

item.title: Check Engine Light is On For Some Reason!
item.description: Check Engine Light is On For Some Reason! #reel #carwizard #cars #mechanic #fblifestyle

item.title: Do You Know How Much This Car Costs?
item.description: Ever wonder about the true cost of a car like this? This video breaks down the full financial reality, explaining the price tag, maintenance costs, and what it takes to own this vehicle.

item.title: Over Two Decades Wrenching: I've Never Seen This Before
item.description: What happens when a pro mechanic faces an unprecedented issue? This video documents a complex diagnostic process on a car problem that a 20-year veteran has truly never encountered.

item.title: Old Cars Take More Time to Fix!
item.description: Why does every repair on an old car take so long? This video documents the challenging reality of fixing vintage vehicles, showing the obstacles, from rust to hard-to-find parts, that extend the repair time.

item.title: NO PPI: Buyer Stuck with Corolla XRS's $1K Repair Bill
item.description: What happens when you skip a pre-purchase inspection? This video shows a buyer's immediate regret after being hit with a $1,000 repair bill for a Corolla XRS. Learn the costly lesson this buyer faced.

item.title: We Found Out The Issue on This 1987 Camaro!
item.description: Go inside a challenging troubleshooting job. This video documents the complex diagnostic process we used to find the issue on this 1987 Camaro and successfully solved the problem.

item.title: Luxury vs Longevity: How Reliable is a Land Rover?
item.description: What's the true cost of Land Rover ownership? This video breaks down the financial reality, comparing the initial luxury experience with the long-term repair and maintenance expenses.
